title: Deadpool and Jim Halpert Will Be Your Imaginary Friends
text:
Photo: Getty Images

Psychological phenomenon alert! John Krasinski and Ryan Reynolds, noted BFFs, are in talks to star alongside each other in a new fantastical comedy titled Imaginary Friends. Per THR, the film follows a man who can see and speak to other people’s nonexistent pals, however, “some imaginary friends, lacking love and friendship, turn to the dark side.” (Murder? Cocaine? Nominating Dave Matthews Band for the Rock Hall?) As such, it’s up to Reynolds’s character to “save the world from those that become evil.” Should negotiations go according to plan, Krasinski will also pull a triple threat as a writer, director, and co-star.
description: Ryan Reynolds and John Krasinski are going to star in a new comedy film called Imaginary Friends, where they can talk to imaginary friends.
